replies.body: I think the patch looks good although I miss the proper Snowdown skins are they still coming out?, also possibly snowy Summoners Rift. From a balance point of view, the akali nerfs not really gonna be felt by 99% of players(So its not that big), but my biggest problem is yuumi e mana cost is too high maybe remove attack speed and reduce the mana cost?
bring back snowy summoner's rift! It's awesome to play on with snowdown skins
So no walking back on the rubbish changes last patch that nerfed enchanter and passive supports into the ground and removed all their best toys, then.
Y'all better not have done this elemental rift nonsense without thinking of snowdown and the snowy rift. I legit look forward to that **every year**.

What about Hextech Swain??
You've given release dates for the 13 other skins coming out...
But just not the one I've actually been waiting for for over a month. :(

Yuumi already had a rough time early game due to mana costs but sure let’s increase it! While your at it, may as well change what players got used to, machanic wise with her. Seriously does this company even ask the community what changes are needed regarding champions or even the game itself? 

Of course not! Other wise we would have urf mode remain permanent. WAKE UP and give the players what they want already.
{{champion:350}} changes are making my head spin
